description:
Does Yanagisawa have a girlfriend?! Based on this suspicion, Banri, Koko, and 2D-kun lie in wait outside Chinami`s house.
However, they are discovered by Chinami and invited to inside.
When they learn of Chinami`s family situation and that she will have to begin living alone, they decide to go to the beach to cheer the sad girl up.
Later, as they head to dinner, they witness an unexpected sight...
Source: crunchyroll
